revised_title: Clarification of Lepidodendron Harcourtii and L. fuliginosum Species
tldr: The author examines and compares various specimens of Lepidodendron Harcourtii and L. fuliginosum, clarifying their differences and establishing the true identity of the original Harcourtii specimen. The study involves analyzing the structure of foliar bundles and the inner cortical zone, leading to the recognition of L. fuliginosum as a distinct species.
